title: Bionic, Hand of Chaos

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Will of Madness** â€” Each night, choose one at random. You may use that ability:
> - Roleblock a player and yourself.
> - Redirect a player to another of your choice.
> - Redirect all players who don't visit tonight to yourself.
> - Attack a player.
> - Use the ability of any Neutral (Killing) role.
> - Choose a player. Whenever someone other than you votes for that player tomorrow, they are hanged immediately, then there's another hang that day.
> - Choose an evil faction. You join that faction and your goal is changed to its.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything other than this attribute or an Everfrost one, the player directly beneath them in the player list (including dead players) is roleblocked as well. Consider the first player in the player list to be directly beneath the last.
- You will attack all players who visit you at night.
- You have a layer of Powerful defense that can prevent one attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
